title: Another Look At The Summer Of 1927 With Bill Bryson
teaser: The book "One Summer: America, 1927" looks at the events of the summer of 1927 and how they reflected and shaped America.
contentencoded:
Author Bill Bryson is known his humorous memoirs like “A Walk in the Woods” and “In a Sunburned Country,” as well as his painstakingly researched and detailed explorations “A Short History of Nearly Everything” and “At Home.”

In his latest book, “One Summer: America, 1927,” he looks at the events of the summer of 1927 and how they reflected and shaped America. We revisit a conversation we had with Bill Bryson when the book was first published.
